# Moyglare Nursing Home

> Moyglare Nursing Home provides compassionate, person-centred residential care in Maynooth, County Kildare, Ireland. HIQA registered with 24/7 nursing care.

## About

Moyglare Nursing Home is a family-run nursing home located in Maynooth, County Kildare, Ireland. We provide long-term residential care, respite care, and dementia care for older adults in a warm, welcoming environment.

## Key Information

- **Location**: Moyglare Road, Maynooth, County Kildare, W23 HF82, Ireland
- **Phone**: +353 1 628 9022
- **Email**: info@moyglarenursinghome.ie
- **Website**: https://www.moyglarenursinghome.ie
- **Capacity**: 53 beds
- **Registration**: HIQA registered (Registration No: 72)
- **Registered Provider**: Moyglare Nursing Home Ltd
- **Person in Charge**: Anne Corcoran

## Services

- Long-term Residential Care
- Respite Care (short-term stays)
- Dementia Care
- Palliative Care
- Convalescent Care
- 24/7 Nursing Care

## Amenities

- Private and semi-private rooms with en-suite bathrooms
- Beautiful landscaped gardens
- Multiple lounges and dining areas
- Chapel and spiritual services
- Physiotherapy and occupational therapy
- Hairdressing salon
- Free WiFi
- Regular activities and entertainment
- Visiting hours 7 days a week

## Team

Our dedicated team includes registered nurses, healthcare assistants, activity coordinators, catering staff, and administrative personnel who work together to provide compassionate, person-centred care.

## Community

Moyglare Nursing Home actively engages with the local community, hosting visits from local schools, music groups, and community organisations. We believe in fostering intergenerational connections and keeping our residents connected to the wider community.

## Contact

For enquiries about admissions or to arrange a visit:
- Phone: +353 1 628 9022
- Email: info@moyglarenursinghome.ie
- Address: Moyglare Road, Maynooth, County Kildare, Ireland

## Visiting Hours

Open for visitors 7 days a week. We encourage family and friends to visit regularly.
